attributes.additional_details: So we have something more positive to concentrate on than just the deaths.
attributes.background: The government and news seem to concentrate on how many deaths, please let us know how many people survive Coronavirus on a daily basis!

rejection.details:
The Government already publishes the number of people who have recovered. You can find it here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-track-coronavirus-cases
